name: LSEC - Leaders In Security
goal: LSEC is a not for profit ICT Security Industry association, representing solution providers, end users and research organizations. The focus of the association is knowledge sharing, expertise building and skills development, networking, innovation, collaborative projects, joint events.
interests: Communication, Development, Economic and Financial Affairs, Information Society, Research and Technology
euInitiatives:
Network & Information Security Directive
General Data Protection Regulation
PSD2
EIDAS
CyberSecurity Regulations
Cyber Security PPP
Horizon 2020
